name: cloudformation-cloudflare
description: This collection of CloudFormation resource types allow Cloudflare to be controlled using AWS CloudFormation.

scripts.clean:all: find . -maxdepth 1 -type d -name "*" -exec bash -c "test -e {}/.rpdk-config && cd '{}' && rm -rf build && rm -rf dist" \;
scripts.prebuild:all: cd Cloudflare-Common && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:all: find . -maxdepth 1 -type d -name "*" -exec bash -c "test -e {}/.rpdk-config && cd '{}' && cfn generate && npm install && npm run build" \;
scripts.build:docs-cp-docs: find . -maxdepth 1 -type d -name "*" -exec bash -c "! test -e {}/.rpdk-config || mkdir -p docs/user/generated/resources/{} && cp {}/docs/* docs/user/generated/resources/{}/" \;
scripts.build:docs-cp-extras: find . -maxdepth 1 -type d -name "*" -exec bash -c "! test -e {}/.rpdk-config || mkdir -p docs/user/generated/resources/{} && cp {}/docs-extra/* docs/user/generated/resources/{}/" \;
scripts.build:docs: npm run build:docs-clean ; npm run build:docs-cp-docs && npm run build:docs-cp-extras && npm run build:docs-cp
scripts.build: npm run build:all && npm run build:docs
scripts.submit:all: find . -maxdepth 1 -type d -name "*" -exec bash -c "test -e {}/.rpdk-config && cd '{}' && cfn submit --set-default -v --region eu-west-1" \;
scripts.test: find . -maxdepth 1 -type d -name "*" -exec bash -c "test -e {}/jest.config.js && cd '{}' && npm test" \;
